basics.name: Stan Fris
basics.summary: Graduate student in AI at University of Amsterdam

publications.name: A Systematic Reproducibility Study of BSARec for Sequential Recommendation
publications.summary: We compare digital signal processing (DSP) techniques and find that the discrete wavelet transform (DWT) offer only slight improvements over Fourier transforms, and DSP methods provide no clear advantage over simple residual connections. Finally, we explore padding strategies and find that non-constant padding significantly improves recommendation performance, whereas constant padding hinders the frequency rescaler's ability to capture high-frequency signals.
